attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We were told on the onset of recycling we would get tax reduction on our council tax but this has not happened .we are still being ripped off we never see a bobby or anything else ...to  have this amount of money  paid for nothing/  incidently it has risen again by 4.5 % again where are we going to find this sort of money when we don`t have enough to pay other bills.. this is why people are moving out of the U K... taxation is a complete and utter JOKE...

rejection.details:
The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
'petition the Prime Minister to K G Mason' does not make sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
